meanings.definition: A piece of land planted with fruit trees.
meanings.sent1: The orchards were filled with apple trees.
meanings.sent2: We picked juicy peaches from the orchards.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel got lost in the orchards.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an orchard of ideas waiting to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The scent of blossoms filled the orchards with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A group of fruit trees cultivated for their produce.
meanings.sent1: The orchards provided a bountiful harvest of oranges.
meanings.sent2: Farmers take care of the orchards to ensure a good yield.
meanings.sent3: The birds held a chirping concert in the orchards.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the orchards like music.
meanings.sent5: The orchards glowed in the golden light of the setting sun.
